name: Kelantan, Here You Come,Where The Exploration Begins ( 3 Days )
description: Your journey here will not disappoint and will be a wonderful memory that will never be forgotten.Kelantan inhabited by ethnic groups such as Malay,Chinese,Siamese ( Thai ),Orang Asli ( Aborigines),and Indians.Malay is the biggest ethnic in Kelantan covered 95% of Kelantan's population.All ethnic live in peace and harmony.Kelantan is famous for its friendly peoples and adhere to the religion.We will meet friendly peoples,their charming village and their paddy fields far as the eye sees all the way travelling in Kelantan.
